text: I wasn't aware you could do AND statements inside an IF statement.
Are you able to do OR also?

when we make a call to the hubDB table to get the rows, is this technically using any of the api call limits or is there a limit set on the number of calls you can make? We have a client who wants to do a typeahead style input so when someone goes to type in there it populates based on information in the table column.
but it would be a text field the system is looking at
I know you can check rate limits using the API `<https://api.hubapi.com/integrations/v1/limit/daily?hapikey=demo>` but it doesnt seem to be taking hubDB queries into account
